channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 10/7プロジェクト」のような親イスラエル派グループが、イスラエルに偏っているとみなすWaPoのルイーザ・ラヴラックのようなジャーナリストの信用を失墜させようとする動きを見てみよう（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
A look at efforts by pro-Israel groups such as the 10/7 Project to discredit journalists like WaPo's Louisa Loveluck, who they deem to be biased against Israel  —  The Scoop  —  Pro-Israel groups, deeply critical of American news outlets such as the Washington Post over their coverage of the war in Gaza …

item.title: ガネットを含む米チェーン紙がいかにしてオールデンのようなPE企業に買収され、搾取されたかを詳述した新著『Hedged』について、マーゴット・ススカにQ&A（Jack Shafer/Politico）
item.description:
Jack Shafer / Politico:
Q&A with Margot Susca on her new book Hedged, which details how the US chain newspapers including Gannett were purchased and squeezed by PE firms like Alden  —  A journalism professor blames Wall Street for the newspaper industry's collapse.  —  The great American newspaper ain't what it used to be.

item.title: NYT記者としてニクソン大統領のカンボジア秘密爆撃作戦を暴露し、ピューリッツァー賞を受賞したウィリアム・ビーチャー氏が2月9日、90歳で死去した（Clay Risen/New York Times）。
item.description:
Clay Risen / New York Times:
William Beecher, who as a NYT reporter revealed President Nixon's secret bombing campaign over Cambodia and Pulitzer Prize winner, died on February 9 at age 90  —  His New York Times scoop enraged the Nixon White House, which ordered a tap on his phone.  He later won a Pulitzer Prize at The Boston Globe.

item.title: ウクライナの2402財団は、VRツールを他の教育方法と融合させ、ジャーナリストのための安全トレーニングを提供している。
item.description:
Laura Oliver / Nieman Lab:
Ukraine's 2402 Foundation blends VR tools with other teaching methods to offer safety training for journalists, and has trained ~500 since the Russian war began  —  “When you end up in an extreme situation, you can't think properly.  In a virtual situation, you realize how you would feel …

item.title: 情報筋ABCニュースのキム・ゴドウィン社長は、同局が直面する難題に立ち向かおうとしていないと批判され、局内では偏向的な存在になっている（ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル紙）。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: ABC News President Kim Godwin has become a polarizing figure inside the network, as critics say she is failing to rise up to challenges facing the unit  —  Expected to be a change agent, Godwin became a polarizing figure and was recently given a new boss; her backers praise her management style

item.title: アマゾンはウィンブルドン前後の7月にロジャー・フェデラーの映画を公開する予定で、トラビス・ケルシーやバリー・サンダースの映画を含むスポーツドキュメンタリー番組に加える（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Amazon aims to debut a Roger Federer movie in July around Wimbledon, adding to sports documentary programming that includes Travis Kelce and Barry Sanders films  —  The tennis great thought he was making a home movie about his last 12 days as a pro.  It turned into a documentary by award-winning filmmaker Asif Kapadia.

item.title: 情報筋：EUは、スポティファイによる2019年の提訴を受け、音楽ストリーミング・サービスへのアクセスをめぐるEU法違反の疑いで、アップルに約5億ユーロの罰金を科す計画だ（Javier Espinoza/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Javier Espinoza / Financial Times:
Sources: the EU plans to fine Apple around €500M for allegedly breaking EU law over access to music streaming services, following a 2019 complaint by Spotify  —  Move is culmination of long-running European Commission antitrust probe after a complaint by Spotify

item.title: メディア専門家や元CNN幹部は、マーク・トンプソンCEOがネットワークを作り直すにあたってコスト削減が必要であり、一部のトップアンカーの給与は削減されるだろうと語っている（Emily Smith/The Wrap）。
item.description:
Emily Smith / The Wrap:
Media experts and former CNN executives say CEO Mark Thompson needs to cut costs as he remakes the network, and some top anchor salaries will likely be pruned  —  As the cable network suffers ongoing dismal ratings, Thompson needs to cut costs — including $50 million in on-air talent

item.title: 現職員や元職員、専門家によれば、シンクレアはトランプに同調する見解で視聴者の不安を煽り、デビッド・スミスはボルチモア・サン紙でも同じことを望んでいる（Sarah Ellison/Washington Post紙）
item.description:
Sarah Ellison / Washington Post:
Current and ex-staff and experts say Sinclair stokes its audience's fears, with views that align with Trump, and David Smith wants the same at The Baltimore Sun  —  The local news powerhouse, whose chairman recently bought the Baltimore Sun, focuses on fear in broadcasts that often align with Donald Trump's view of cities

item.title: レブロン・ジェームズが経営するSpringHillは、広告主向けのスポンサード・ショート・ビデオの制作で2億ドルの収益の大半を得ている。
item.description:
Jessica Toonkel / Wall Street Journal:
A look at the expansion plans of LeBron James' SpringHill, which makes most of its $200M in revenue from creating sponsored short videos for advertisers  —  The basketball legend is building a business that includes movies and TV, advertising and a grooming line.

item.title: 法律ニュースサービスLaw360がニュースルームの10％をレイオフ、影響を受けるジャーナリストは1人あたり、同サービスの親会社レクシスネクシスは2023年に過去最高益を記録（Natalie Korach/The Wrap）
item.description:
Natalie Korach / The Wrap:
Legal news service Law360 lays off 10% of its newsroom, per impacted journalists; the outlet's parent company LexisNexis saw record profits in 2023  —  Unionized editorial staffers staged a one-day strike against parent company LexisNexis in December  —  Law360, the subscription-based legal …

item.title: 情報源Redditは2024年の早い時期に、年換算で〜6000万ドル相当の契約を結び、無名の大手AI企業がRedditのコンテンツでモデルを訓練できるようにした（Amy Or/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Amy Or / Bloomberg:
Sources: Reddit signed a deal early in 2024, worth ~$60M on an annualized basis, allowing a large unnamed AI company to train its models on Reddit's content  —  - Social media firm agrees $60 million deal with AI company  — Reddit advised to seek at least $5 billion IPO valuation

item.title: NBCユニバーサルが動画ストリーミングサービス「Vudu」のブランドを「Fandango at Home」に変更、映画チケット販売事業「Fandango」との連携を強化（Chris Welch/The Verge）
item.description:
Chris Welch / The Verge:
NBCUniversal rebrands video streaming service Vudu to Fandango at Home, more closely aligning it with its Fandango movie ticketing business  —  Fandango has decided to completely rebrand Vudu, a streaming video service that's been around for over a decade, to Fandango at Home.

item.title: フランス4誌の南アジア特派員ヴァネッサ・ドゥグナック氏、「悪意ある」報道のためインド政府から退去を迫られていると語る（The Wire）
item.description:
The Wire:
Vanessa Dougnac, South Asia correspondent for four French publications, says India's government is forcing her to leave because of her “malicious” reporting  —  New Delhi: French journalist Vanessa Dougnac, who had been the longest serving foreign correspondent in India …

item.title: パラマウントは、バイアコムの合併、投資不足、その他の問題により、160億ドル以上の負債を抱えることになり、ストリーミング戦争の警鐘となった（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
How Paramount became a cautionary tale of the streaming wars, as the Viacom merger, a lack of investment, and other issues left it with $16B+ in debt  —  Shari Redstone inherited her father's storied media empire and tried to take on Netflix.  Now it's looking for a buyer.
